summary: A visual remastering of all Stormcloak footsoldier/guard equipment in the game.
descriptionHtml:
[center][color=#0099FF][size=24][b]FTR - Stormcloak[/b][/size][/color]
[color=#7ACAFF][size=2]An Installment of Flobulon\'s Texture Revival[/size][/color][/center]


[size=3][color=#0099FF][b]Hello.[/b][/color][/size]
This is the first installment of what I hope will become a series, in which I aim to remaster Bethesda\'s console-tastic textures to what I feel to be a more appropriate level of detail - while still keeping the original artistic intent intact.
All textures included in the pack are double the original resolution - but don\'t worry, this isn\'t an upscale and sharpen job. I spend a lot of time on each set of textures, including normal maps.

Enjoy!

[color=#0099FF][b] - Flobulon[/b][/color]


[size=3][color=#0099FF][b]Details[/b][/color][/size]
The textures remastered in this pack are:
	- Stormcloak Cuirass (including town guard colourations)
	- Stormcloak Helm (including town guard colourations)
	- Stormcloak Shield
	- Fur Gloves
	- Fur Boots

[size=3][color=#0099FF][b]Installation[/b][/color][/size]
Copy the \"Data\" folder into your Steam/Steamapps/Common/Skyrim folder. Say yes to any prompts about merging folders. 

[size=3][color=#0099FF][b]Uninstallation[/b][/color][/size]
Delete the textures/armor/stormcloak folder from your Data folder.

[size=3][color=#0099FF][b]Version History[/b][/color][/size]
[quote]
	23/11/11 - 1.0 - First Release
	26/11/11 - 1.1 - Specs and normals remastered, cloth improved
[/quote]
[size=3][color=#0099FF][b]Contact[/b][/color][/size]

Contact the creator of this mod, Flobulon, on www.skyrimnexus.com or www.thenexusforums.com or through the comments page of this mod.

[size=3][color=#0099FF][b]Credits[/b][/color][/size]
Bethesda - original textures
madgiraffe - for providing invaluable advice
Flobulon
author: Flobulon
